"Um, hi Rachel."
She turns and smiles at you then stops to talk.
"Hi Algie, I think Miss Richards really gets the feeling of music, don't you?"
For a moment your mind blanks. You were thinking of something entirely different from the class you've just finished.
"Oh... yes, she's very a good teacher. I... I need to talk to you about something Rachel. In private."
Rachel frowns for a moment, but then her smile returns.
"Have you been having trouble in English again Algie? Hmm, why don't we use one of the music rooms? We've got time before next period to go over things."
You stammer for a moment, then just nod and follow her into one of the practice rooms. Watching her from behind is even more tense for you. She may dress modestly, but still you can't help but stare at her rear and wonder how it would taste without that skirt covering it.

For a moment you try to resist. Not eating her is the way out of this pleasant prison. Just push her away and... You miss out on a great meal, and you are feeling a bit peckish... Sigh...It's just so hard to stick to a diet...

1221121221222112211222122112211111111112.content:
"Look," you plea. "Why not just go along with the court order?"

"It will deprive a great many women of what they want."

"But..."

"And it will cost you a fortune. You will be bankrupt for life."

"Oh..."

"The rent on this place is frightful, if you are an unemployed musician. It is quite reasonable if women are paying for body work, which is what this order would stop. We've got enough to survive for the month, with the rent other women will be paying, but you have a lease for the next year, and so you could be stuck for great gobs of money.
"So we have got to fight this order, and do so right away. The first step is keeping the process server here. She'll stay in your belly today, and tomorrow you will give her a work over. and that will keep her another day."

The voice of the process server protests "But I don't want any body work!"

Rachel is among a chorus of girls pointing out how much better she could look. She resists at first, but soon accepts that she will look a whole lot better. "There, that is settled. So you will be busy today and tomorrow processing all the women we can. That should give us the cash to avoid immediate disaster. Then we will have to see what the lawyer has to say. I hope Diana and Anitia can get back fast."

They are not, but you are in no rush. There is a host of delicious women to drink and others to entertain you as well. But about noon, a rather severe woman enters and Introduces herself "Algie, I am Deborah Morgan. I am to be your attorney if you wish." A look at Rachel reveals you had better so wish, and so you agree. "Now your associates have already told me much of the story, but I will need your version. So if you will..."

Telling your story sounds like fun, and so you tell her of the past few strange days. She asks a variety of questions, many of which make no sense to you. You can understand asking if all the girls are all right, but their ages? How would you know?

Finally she has had enough. "Your case has definite problems and I have no idea how it is going to turn out. You really should have consulted a lawyer before you even started this business. The whole thing opens up several new aspects of law. I have very little hope of us being able to claim lawyer-client privileges when you constantly have a dozen women in your belly who are able to both listen in and take part. And that is just a minor issue. I fear the result will depend on the whim of the judge.
"Critical, I understand is keeping you in business, and I'll file the needed motions to allow you to stay open until the court rules, but I am not making any guarantees the court will see things your way. Now, if you will excuse me..." And with that she departs, one of the few women who have managed to avoid your guts. [But she can't file the paperwork while she is inside you, so you don't try anything.]

Things are getting interesting, and you are beginning to see the advantages of boredom.
1221121221222112211222122112211111111112.title: You get a Lawyer

1221121221222112211222122112211111111112.title: Trouble with school

1221121221222112211222122112211111111112.content:

"OK, I made an appointment for you with the principal in two days. I still can't get much explanation about the charges. Most of them, like this missing classes, is pretty petty stuff. You have been missing some since this stuff started, but it shouldn't be making a fuss that reaches the principal.
"This 'conduct harmful to the image of the university' seems the biggie, but nobody will explain. I assume somebody has gotten uptight about you gobbling girls, but I can't find out who or why. Lots of candidates of course. The cops have already tried to nail you. I wouldn't be surprised to find there is some feminist group or bunch of fundamentalists who are putting pressure on the university. And there are all sorts of other people who might be yelling. But I can't find out who."

"But what do I do?"

"Keep the appointment and see what you can discover. That's about all we can do."

Still, you do know how shrill those girls can get and there is all too much chance the administration would throw you to those she-wolves. Well, at least your plan will be more fun.

The big day starts normally in some respects with you freeing those lovelies that were in your belly yesterday [The process server is quite pleased with your changes and quickly hands over a check.], and oddly in others, or rather as was entirely normal not long ago. The plan is a little hairbrained, and looking more so the closer you get to liftoff. The 3 leaders of the critics have been called to a "meeting". They just don't know [you hope] that the meeting is with you, and that each has a different meeting time. If all goes well, they will have a chance to learn at first hand just what you do.

"Jessica! You ok?"

For a moment you wonder if she can hear you. You certainly don't want to yell after all. Then "Huh? Oh, Yes! I feel wonderful!"

"You sure you are all right?"

"Well, I could use a little fresh air, but.." You quickly swallow a few times..."Yes, that is better, but don't worry about me. This is so where I belong. When I get out of here, I am going to be so grateful to you..."

This much eagerness in a woman is almost scary. "But you're a virgin, aren't you?"

"I won't be an hour after I can get at you. I am so happy right now and you deserve every reward I can give you."

Well, if she really insists... "Hang on. I think I can cough you up."

"Don't you dare! I want every inch of this. You get your reward when I...exit the other way."

Women! Your reward is always being dangled an inch out of your reach. "But what if I digest you?"

"I'll take my chances. Besides, I think I would enjoy that too."

"But.."

"Thinking of yourself? Well, don't worry. If I didn't digest last time, I shouldn't this time either. Besides, I bet I tasted delicious, and you would get a month's worth of nutrition out of me if you did digest me."

True enough. You consider things for a moment, before shrugging, and getting to your feet. "Alright, I guess I will see you after school then... ", you say, as you open the door, and begin heading to your next class, grinning at the soft squirms, and light moans of your stomach's new occupant.

While Jessica's movements in your stomach are distracting for the first few hours, you eventually are able to tone them out, only barely noticing when she exits your stomach. It isn't until you finally arrive home that you realize that Jessica has stopped moving inside you

"Jessica...?" You ask, looking down at your belly, and focusing intently on attempting to discern if your occupant is still with you.

Who I can be seen with in public, where I can go, and if I disagree I'll be out of the club. I like it, they've got a great clubhouse with a disco room, catering, everything (I think Donna's parents paid for it) but I'm really starting to dislike them. What do I do?"

The idea pops into your head suddenly. For a moment you just stare at the wall, the memories of meeting those three girls imprinted on your mind as you hug Jessica. Meeting and eating them!
"Um, Jessica? Do you really hate those girls?"
She sighs, still hugging you tight.
"Oh yes, they've been so mean! To begin with I didn't even see it, but now, they treat me like I was so beneath them. I don't want to get kicked out of that place, but they are just so awful!"
Hmm, the clubhouse. You doubt Donna's parent would let Jessica still use it after you ate her... well, maybe you could just eat Lisa and Yvonne and threaten Donna so she lets Jessica in?
"Jessica, there's something I should tell you." she stands up, looking into your eyes quizzically. "Well, this morning I felt a bit odd and... sorta... dislocated my jaw."
"Oh Algie, how awful!"
"Oh, it's OK, it didn't hurt, and actually it sort fit with a..." you look around, but the few students near you aren't paying you any attention and are too far away to hear you anyway. "... fantasy I've had for a long time. Will you promise not to tell anyone else if I tell you?"

"Swallow someone alive? But, that seems incredible!" she murmurs "I've seen snakes do things like that, but people? That shouldn't be possible!"
You glance at her. She's certainly taking it well. Smiling you remember why you always liked her. She always believed in you, always trusted you, and you could never lie to her.
"Jessica? A thought did occur to me just now. If you really hate those girls, and I can really do this... I could eat them, at least Yvonne and Lisa, and force Donna to let you keep using the clubhouse."
Jessica went wide eyed, staring at you for a few moments. lips pursed, but still keeping pace with you as you walk.

1322111.content:
The next period goes by slowly for you, anxious for the lunch hour to start. Finally with ten minutes left to go you can't wait any more and head for Practice room 12.
Inside it you stop. For a moment you think you've gone into a doctor's office instead. Arranged around the room are a variety of medical looking devices ranging from stethoscopes to blood pressure armbands to thermometers. There is also a large coil of rope. Before you can think on what this all means the door opens behind you. You turn to find Jessica coming in with a box in her arms.
"Oh Algie! I didn't expect you here for a few minutes. Er, can you help me get things ready?"
You hasten to help her with the box which seems to hold some body lotion, liquid soaps, and towels.
"Oh, and can you bring the tub in?" she adds pointing to the door.
You go back to the door and look outside. Sure enough there is an old style bathtub on a trolly there. She dragged this over here?
"What is this all for?" you ask as you pull the bathtub in and close the door.
"For the test of course Algie. Now help me connect the hose. I can't get the bath near enough to the faucet to fill it directly."
Puzzled you help her connect a hose from the room's hot water faucet to the piping under the bath. She then plugs the drain up and turns it on, slowly filling the bath.
"There! That's the post test preparations done then." she says as she puts the cleaning bottles on a table beside the tub. "Now for the pre test preparations!"
"What pre test prep..." you stop, jaw hanging open as Jessica pulls her dress up over her head and folds it neatly, laying it on a counter. She stretches in her underwear, smiling at you. Then she starts to undo her bra. "What are you doing?" you say, gaping at her uncovered chest.
"Well Aglie, do you expect me to get my clothes all sticky?" she smiles as she slides her panties down. "There, now to get ready!"
She gets out the bottle of body lotion and starts lathering it on herself.
"I tried to get something that would taste good, it's supposed to be strawberry. It doesn't taste like strawberry exactly, but it's not bad." she says, licking a finger before continuing to cover herself in the lotion.
You stare for several seconds, slowly coming to the realisation of what she means.
"You... want me to... swallow you?"
Jessica smiles sweetly at you, finishing the lathering and stepping across to the table with the rope.
"Yes of course, and with this attached you should be able to pull me out afterwards too." she digs in another box "Plus I'll be taking these antacids with me, just to be sure."
You stare at her, standing there buck naked, tying a rope around her middle and holding a bottle of antacids.
"I.. I don't know what to say Jessica! This is the best thing anyone has ever given me! And it isn't even my birthday!"

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: The interview finishes well

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
A chance to play for a possible gig. That's great for just the first day of asking for them. A new band might ask a hundred times to get its first listen. And most of those who get a quick chance are those who have experienced members, who have contacts that get them in. Really great to get a chance on just the first day.
You try reminding yourself that if there is one chance in one hundred, first is just as likely as last, so an early offer doesn't really mean much. But even if it doesn't mean much, it does mean you have this chance. That's enough to thrill you.
It's also enough to make you smug when everybody assembles for evening practice. You figure it would be a little more dramatic to not bring up your success right away, so you ask the others "Any luck?"

To your surprise, Rae speaks right up. "Two Doors is a rather lousy joint, but they'll give us a listen."

Then Linda says "Well, the Tank is a great spot and they will give us a listen too.

Tammy offers "Jerkie's may not be much the way they go thru bands, but we got a listen there, and that will mean a gig if we don't screw up."

The others pipe in with their success stories, and your dramatic success deflates from something for a standing ovation to just routine. Still good news, but just another piece of good news. Kinda hard on your ego. Still, one should think about the band, for which this is all great news.

"Wow, this is fantastic!" Laura enthuses. "We are going to be big!"

"I'm not so sure. Several of these are just perverted owners who want to see our act." Rachel demurs. "They may not be interested in giving us gigs."

"But if they are interested," ask Inbal "won't their customers also be interested?"

"You have a point." Jessica agrees. "But right now we have got to arrange times and dates for all these possibles. Let's see..."

There are the expected conflicts and calls to the various clubs must be made to resolve them. And of course, the solutions produce additional conflicts. But soon enough, you have a schedule down, even if not everybody is thrilled with it.

"All these acts on the same day." moans Tammy. "I'll be going up and down Algie's throat like a yo-yo."

"And enjoying every minute of it" Rachel counters, "while the rest of us have to do the packing. You got it soft."

Tammy of course does not agree, but it's time to prepare for the trials, the first of which will be your place, the Bottomless Pit. The next day, you are entering that place again, to be greeted by Jake, who has a loving Pam draped over him.

"I really got to thank you a lot. I've been trying to get in Pam's pants for over a month with no luck, and now she just can't get enough of me. " A statement confirmed by Pam giving him a loving kiss as his hand cups one of her hips. "Now as I said, I can't throw out my band no matter how much I owe you, but they won't mind a night or two off, and bands do move on. So if you are any good, I can at least give you a few spots, and maybe it will turn into a real gig.
"Anyway. Just set up over there and go to it."
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: Jake get to listen

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
This is a big event for you. Your first chance to become a paid band. Now is the time to play like you have never played before ... Wait! That could have a negative connotation, couldn't it?
Yeah... You need to play well, but you need to avoid doing something stupid too. Settle down and play well. Don't do anything crazy...

You don't. But there are still the little blunders of nervousness. Still, you don't do anything terrible. You end the act with a belly full of Tammy, and a feeling you were kind of middlin. Not as good as you wanted, but if Jake was telling the truth...

It seems he might have been. "Like I said. I've got a good band, and I'm not going to replace them with you. But they won't mind a night or two off at times, and I can squeeze you in then. I will have to check with them, but I figure they will let you have the slow night next week. Give me a call in a day.
"In the meantime, keep on practicing. You may have a specialty that will get you a start, but you need better music if you are to survive."

You of course thank him for this small favor. He insists he owes you thanks since you helped with Pam [which in a way is bad for you. To succeed, you are going to need a lot of favors of course, but the more you need, the less likely you are to get them. Still, it is a chance to play.] Then you have to get someplace private to spit out Tammy [and congress with her], which just happens to take the exact amount of time it takes the rest of the band to pack up. The girls don't directly accuse you of dodging the work, but you do end up promising to do extra after the final performance. So quickly off to the next tryout in very good spirits.

Rae got you into the Two Doors and so she takes the lead in introducing you to the manager there, a not too impressive fellow, who sits thru your performance in an impassive manner, and is not greatly impressed. Still, his "We don't have an opening at the moment, but you never know. Call back in a week." means it is not hopeless. If you get a break, you might be playing here.

Which is more than you will be at the Tank. You have barely started to eat Tammy when the manager is screaming for you to stop. Then he and Linda get into a yelling match over whether she had lied about the act or he had not been listening. You figure it's a combination, but it doesn't matter. You are already packing before he announces you won't be playing at his place even if he was going broke otherwise, that your act is illegal, immoral [and fattening? Well, it might be for you anyway. You are eating huge amounts of fine food.] and that you are to leave before he calls the cops.

As you head home, the band is in a dismal mood. Being kicked out like that hurts. To cheer them up, you announce to the others "One pretty sure date, and one possibility. That's quite a good result for the first day. And we may do better tomorrow."
The girls realize you are right, or at least still have the optimism that one must have to engage in such a long shot venture as joining a band. Either way, the mood is much better by the time you start evening practice.
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: It goes well[?]

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
The next day certainly doesn't start well.

In a way it does. Having been tossed out last time, you start by giving the manager a detailed description of the act. The manager manages "Oh mi god. We get parents, and children, here. I'd be fired for putting you on, and they might fire the guy who hired me." You don't have to go to any trouble at all before you are on your way again, and criticizing Inbal for even suggesting the place.

Inbal is not contrite. "Would not the show have been educational?" Technically she is right of course, but you all deem her so wrong.

The next place is more accepting of your act and the manager sits thru it with apparent interest. Afterwards you retire to spite out [and hump] Tammy while the other girls do the grunt work [and grumble about you.] But when you rejoin them, you find you and Tammy are not the target of their ire. "What's the matter? I thought he liked the act."

"He did." a furious Laura tells you. "We get a gig-"

"That's bad?" you unwisely interrupt.

"-if I sleep with him."

"Oh... " you answer. You had kinda figured this would happen some time, but with many other things to take care if, it had sorta been neglected. A top band likely doesn't need to worry, and the third rate are just rejected, but when you are second rate, or new in your case, the guy offering the gig can demand extra, which can be the girls. "I take it you don't want to..."

"I am not touching that leech!" Laura declares. "He makes me sick."

"He is kinda cute..." Tammy hesitantly ventures.

"Then you ball him!" Laura rounds on her.

Tammy takes a step back. "Well, he didn't ask me... and..."

As Tammy searches for an excuse, you rashly step into the fray. "Look, you do like boys..., and every so often we each have to take one for the team..."

That's when Inbal asks "Aren't quite a few of these managers gay?"

That produces a number of giggles from the girls, and a retreat by you. "OK, OK. You don't want to. We don't try to persuade you. But we are begging for work here. I hope you were at least nice in saying no."

"I gave him a black eye actually." [a report most of the band responds to with a strange combination of being appalled with the loss of much hope of a gig and firm approval.]

"Well, some of us boys are good sports and won't hold it against you. We chalk it up to experience, and go on to the next place."
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: more tryouts

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
Any time a band gets together, the questions come up "would this change make the act better?", or "Would this change appeal to people?", or even "Can't we just change? Because the act is boring me!"

With an unsuccessful day behind you, these questions jump out right away, even if the day wasn't that unsuccessful or that unexpected. Suggestions are made by several of you until Laura announces "We do need some more songs. I've written one..." When nobody tries to stop her, she recites...
"Beware the frog in the bog
He sits on a log
You may miss him in the fog.
Poor Mary went for a jog.
It turned into a slog.
When she passed the log,
The frog behaved like a dog
It was terribly crass to bite her sweet ass
It was uncommonly crude to treat her like food
And tho she fought back, she was just a snack
With just a bib, his tongue hit a hip
And after a jerk, Mary lost her perk
She hollered "Nay!", but the frog had its way
It treated her raw and pulled her to its maw
she was bent double, Mary was in trouble.
The nasty twerp made a big slurp
Even as she begs he swallows her fine legs
He’s up to her knee. Not a hope she can flee
Her chest was the best, but it went in with the rest
He did a check of her neck, which was up to spec.
Last was her head which he would soon imbed
One last gulp and Mary was pulp
A final slurp and then just a burp.
And poor Mary was grog for this hog
Yes, Beware the frog in the bog
He sits on a log
You may miss him in the fog."

"Hokey" is Tammy's opinion.

"I suppose your song is high art." an offended Laura responds.

"Don't we want hokey?" Inbal asks.

It seems a dumb question, until Rachel answers "You could be right. We may well want hokey. We are behaving rather shockingly. But if we sing hokey songs, we seem a lot more normal and acceptable..."

"It's still a lousy song." Tammy insists.

"You're just jealous. You think you should write all the songs!"

It's an unkind remark, all the more so for being likely true. But before Tammy can respond in kind, Jessica puts in. "We may have to revise it at least..."

"Yeah," you agree. "I've never eaten any of you hip first. We need to make sure I can do that. Laura, you want to get really into your song?
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: working on the act

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
"But..."

"Oh come on, Laura." Tammy argues rather hostilely. "Somebody has to test the idea, and it's your song. So the honor should be yours."

Of course Laura doesn't see it that way. The ladies may go down your throat almost on a daily basis, but it still bothers most of them some. And doing it a new way makes it all the worse. So Laura tries to get out from under, with a number of unkind remarks to Tammy, and little success. She yields with "All Right! But you have got to sign the song as I get eaten!"

Tammy blusters about this, but soon realizes there is no way to avoid this. Now the conversation turns to making this look "real". [An odd goal when you are going to do this with a naked Laura, but still...] Your tongue seems to expand when you gobble a lass, but it gets nowhere big enough to stick out and hit like a frog tongue, much less stick to her and drag her in. But a piece of rope around her works for the moment. [You figure you will have to work on that some.]
So now Tammy starts the song [pausing at times for nasty criticisms of Laura or her song]. A nude Laura comes by as "Mary" and you pull on the rope until her hips are in range of your mouth. You open as wide as you can, and...
She fits in. Maybe a bit tight, but still, she is going in. Laura gives a little squeal as your lips reach her skin, and then a big one as your tongue reaches her most sensitive area. That in turn produces a debate, which lasts quite awhile, as to whether you should molest the girl during the act. It lasts long enough for you to bring Laura to screaming climaxes twice. [She protests this is not gentlemanly behavior by you, but you suspect this is mostly her trying to play {maybe overplay} Mary.]
This, like other points, is finally put off until later, and you start actually eating delicious Laura as Tammy sings [and insults song and Laura] while Laura [over]plays Mary [and hurls insults back]. Inch after inch of Laura's taut skin slides past your lips and down your throat. Soon only hands, feet, and head are sticking out. A couple more gulps and she is stowed into your belly.

This doesn't stop the argument between Laura and Tammy, who gets her face next to your belly as the two yell at each other. They Ignore Rae approaching and whispering in your ear as she says "This has gotten out of hand. We are going to lose Tammy or Laura and we need both. We have got to have them friends. So why not try why you did with Nurse Heini and me?"

"But you complain about her all the time."

"I'm her 'daughter'. Of course I complain. But that means I put up with her, not try to split the band or something. And she helps me a lot. In the end, we are tight. You try it with these two and maybe the fighting won't end, but it will be under control. We'll keep it in the family."

"Well..."
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: Laura is a ham

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
"What do the other girls think?" It's a good question. If they get upset about this stunt, that would be worse than this quarrel. It's also a question that Rae hasn't considered. "Go and see what they think."

The very fact that Rae can leave without either Tammy or Laura noticing, much less notice that she is plotting something they are going to object to, already hints that Rae's idea may be necessary. The band needs both Tammy and Laura. You worked hard to get Laura and while Tammy just dropped into your laps, she is proving extremely valuable. You don't want to get by without either one of them, and as vicious as their argument is getting, you could end up losing both. Keeping them both sounds like a dream, and maybe a nightmare. You are not sure how the band can survive without them, and unless this arguing can be stopped, you don't see how it can survive.
Rae's outrageous idea sounds less outrageous the more you consider the alternatives...

The girls come to more or less the same conclusion, tho not quickly or easily. You can't catch what they are saying over what your two furies are saying to each other, but you can guess fairly well.
They think the idea impossible at first, and then absolutely unacceptable... until they look at Tammy screaming at your belly, and realizing Laura is doing the same inside you. They look back to Rae and insist it is still impossible...and then look at Tammy again ... and try to find any alternative... The number of looks and resistance varies, but at length they each nod acceptance of the idea or make no attempt to stop Rae as she comes back to you to report their agreement.

Before she arrives, you have already started the plan. "I'm tired of being the man in the middle. Laura, you are coming out. Tammy, back off."

Tammy does, but with an attitude of returning to the fight as soon as she can. You chug a purge and soon Laura is on her way out of you. When she does get out, she, as usual, wants sex. She is puzzled, but pleased, when you direct her head to your tool and opens wide. Then she panics when your rod opens even wider.
She has little time to do anything before her head is engulfed, but that little is enough to alert Tammy, who is thrilled at Laura's frantic efforts to get loose. As Laura is pulled instead, her excitement gets out of control and her hands slide into her pants and start vigorous action. Soon her pants are around her knees and she is shuttering in joy.
She is not alone in that. You have already climaxed twice, which seems to lubricate your piece and make it easier for Laura to slip in. Laura in the meantime is enjoying a blinding explosion that about knocks her out as her bountiful breasts go in.
The rest of Laura's capture is also well enjoyed by all three of you. [Possibly by some of the other girls too. You are a little too distracted to be sure they are the source of the noise, or that the noise is a lass going over the top.] You seem to climax the most as each stimulating inch of Laura slides in, but both of the girls reach a peak more than once.

Finally the last of Laura has entered your balls, and Tammy happily, and rashly, approaches "Well, that takes care of that bitch." and then noting your enlarged member, "Wow, she really stretched that. How are ever going to get that into a girl."

"Very easily. Watch."

"Huh? What? Wait! Stop! St... Ooooo." But Tammy's desperate effort to avoid impalement is a failure. Surprisingly quickly, she massively explodes, which knocks the fight out of her. Even the sight of Laura moving back up your staff merely produces a mild question "What is going on?". The explanation produces only a weak protest.

Even as Laura starts to enter Tammy's womb, Tammy comes again. She is still recovering as Laura is fully inside, making a massive belly, which immediately starts to expel Laura.
Tammy's scream fits giving birth to a "baby" an easy dozen times the size it should be. The girls, who had been standing well away, perhaps to rather futilely deny their involvement, rush to her side and try to help her. About the best they can do is give her comforting words, but they seem to work. Tammy is much quieter during the rest of Laura's "birth", which is fortunately quick.

"My baby! Bring me my baby!" Tammy pleas. The girls quickly respond and pull a confused Laura to Tammy, who grabs her and pulls her head to one of her breasts, which seem rather swollen. A tit is put into her mouth and Laura starts to suckle. As she does, Tammy hugs and kisses her as she mutters comments like "My beautiful baby. My precious. I so love you. I'm going to protect you and help you..."

Well, a rather surprised Rachel remarks, "it seems to have worked."
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: Tammy & Laura become mother-daughter

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
"Worked? What worked?" asks a inconveniently alert Laura.

It might be best to just deny everything, but Tammy and Laura would likely figure it out eventually. So maybe Rae is not being that rash. But she is still acting more out of pride about her idea than that it is just as well to be honest as she explains "With you two fighting so much, we figured we were about to lose one or both of you, and so we made you mother and daughter so you won't fight so much. I got to be Nurse Heini's daughter this way, and so I know it works."

"It works? Oh it works! This is criminal assault! I have enough problems with my natural mother, and you stick me with another?" Laura nearly screams.

"Now dear" Tammy soothes, "You're right. They shouldn't have. But I'm here to help you... Mind you, you should wear less enticing clothing."

"My dresses are a good inch longer than yours!"

"Well, yes," Tammy admits, "but I'm your mother and I need to make sure you behave better than I do."

As Laura rolls her eyes, Rae rashly breaks in "See? It's working. Before we did this, you would be screaming at her."

"OK, I'll yell at you instead. This is criminal, criminal folly. You are tying a cat and dog together. I don't want to be her daughter! I don't want to be pushed around!"

"You know, I think the problem is that we are not tied together close enough." Tammy offers. "How about we make you my mother?" As Laura looks stunned, she continues "That would give us the equality of both being mother and daughter. And I don't think you would be nearly likely to get angry about silly things."

Laura seems about ready to give a long list of reasons why this is insane, but as she opens her mouth, her expression changes, and she says "You know. I think I'll try that.
"But I am not forgiving any of you. If you think this nonsense is so good for me, you can suffer it too. I want each of you to become the daughter of all the others."

"But..." comes from several throats.

"No exceptions!" Laura rules. "You did it to me, and so I am going to do it to you."

"Well, that is a lot of action." Tammy objects. "I don't think Algie is up to doing that many just now. We can wait a little while before we go much further."

Laura seems to accept this and Tammy approaches you for her turn of being the child.
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: daughter throws a tantrum

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
Tho it was her idea, Tammy is a bit reluctant "Ah, is it possible to go feet first? That way, if things go wrong..." You assure her it is, and she sits down on the couch and extends her toes.
You approach with your soldier at attention and touch its head to her big toes, and things work as expected. Your piece starts to expand to take her in. It doesn't get big enough for you to just walk her legs in. Indeed, you pretty much come to a halt while your staff starts to expand over her.
Tammy finds this enjoyable surprisingly quickly. She seems to climax almost immediately, and again shutter with joy quickly thereafter. But you are soon reaching the top too, covering her with sticky fluids that are acting amazing well as lubrication. As the two of you continue to enjoy the whole thing, your member continues to expand, covering the curves of her calves, her trim thighs, hot hips, a slim middle, and on to breasts inflamed with emotion.
Her frequent positive approval of that emotion is expressed loudly, which is surely a relief to the rest of the ladies. They may be able to talk Laura out of her demand they do this too, but Laura may well hold the whip hand, and if they will be forced into it, at least it won't be too bad. You even hear Rae saying she may do this voluntarily. The others disagree, quite vigorously in some cases, tho you hear Rae ask one of them "If you disagree so much, why are you beating off?" You don't hear the answer.
Tammy too has been abusing herself thru much of the process. Her hands had been on her womanly center since you passed her knees, and she is still at it as her shoulders and head are covered by your meat. That stimulates you as well as her, but of course, everything about this is stimulating, and just what does what is a lot of guess.

With Tammy almost into your testicles, you reach for Laura, who backs away. "Now, Laura, you agreed to this. In fact you demanded it." For a moment she still hesitates, but Laura is often willing to change her mind, and now she advances, grabs your enlarged 2nd brain, and shoves it into its natural home.
For a second, nothing happens. Then it starts to pump, and to drive Tammy into Laura. Again, this is a process that is more fun for you than for her, but somehow she is enjoying getting "pregnant". Her climaxes may not match Tammy's, but they are more frequent.
She doesn't enjoy the "birth", but compared to Tammy, it is an easy one. [You are dumb enough to mention this opinion, and Laura demonstrates a considerable knowledge of profanity, detailing your total lack of worth and general depravity. You are wise enough to at least shut up and let her vent.]
Possibly the eagerness of the other girls to comfort her is part of the trick.
In any case, Tammy is soon deposited on the floor and is then guided to Laura's waiting breast, and it is Tammy's turn to suckle while being cuddled.
It's a quite loving picture of mother-daughter, even if baby is way bigger than normal.

"So far, so good." Rachel says. "Next comes the real test. Will they be able to work together now? We are going to have a real mess if they don't, and it would just be like Laura to make it worse."

"I bet it works." Rae insists, "They already seem better and making it a double has got to help..."
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: daughter become mother

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
"OK, let's separate them and go back to working on the song." Jessica suggests.

"Do you suppose it will be better if they do so on their own?" counters Inbal.

"Well, I don't see how it would hurt to wait..." Rachel decides, "Let's get back to work and let them rejoin on their own."

There is at least plenty to do. The song does not scan properly and the right music must be selected...

And as you might have predicted, Tammy and Laura soon part and join the discussion. Both have a lot invested in the song, tho in quite different directions. You hold your breath as Tammy starts to talk.

With a martyred sigh like you have heard from your mother entirely too often, Tammy concedes "Very well. We will use this ...song..., if you insist, but..." You of course "hear" her saying "this is trash we should not touch, but if you insist, I will allow you your foolish whim."

As in your own case a time or two, Laura answers what is not said. "This is a great song! And we need more songs!"

Despite the disagreement, you are not the only one giving out a sigh of relief. True, they are still fighting, and sometimes rather shrilly, but an edge is missing. They are not going for the throat. Instead of yells, their weapons are hugs, tears, and begging. Kinda weird, but not nearly as hard on the ears of the others. Of course, when you criticize either, you are apt to have both turn on you, but while that is a bit of a shock the first time, it defuses many an argument as both must be prepared to abandon her position to defend her poor daughter from this "unwarrented" attack.
That in turn quiets the rest of you. You push too hard and suddenly you are outnumbered, and being pushed back. Rather weird to merely parrot what one has said, and in less volume, only to have her turn and attack you for doing so, but overall it is easier to deal with. Just lower your voice and try not to make it sound like you are calling either of the idiots idiots. Kinda irritating to get used to it seems it makes it easier to discuss the ideas without arguing.

Finally you announce "OK, that's enough for now. It looks like we have the making of a decent song here, but we will need to work on it some more. We also do need a couple more songs, so we will have to work on them some time."

"We also need to make you all mothers and daughters." Laura reminds the others. "You aren't escaping that."

There is limited enthusiasm for this. "We had best wait until we are sure..." qualifies Linda.

"I can do a set now." you offer. Doing Laura and Tammy had been a lot of fun.

"Are you ready to deal with seven mothers?" asks Inbal.

"She may be right." Rachel agrees. "Judging from these two, we'll all be united against you. You are going to be really henpecked. Sure you want to rush into that?"

"Well, I guess we can wait a little..." A comment that gets a good amount of laughter at your expense.
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: They argue some

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
The rest of the evening and the next day is normal enough, if you can call anything about your life normal. But gobbling a bunch of girls, dumping them out the next day and having sex with them is pretty normal now. And having Tammy and Laura demanding the other ladies become mothers and daughters too somehow is becoming normal pretty quickly too. The others are likely going to cave soon, but they, rather wisely, are holding out for the moment. Even if things are working out so far, they could go very wrong, and this might be a "marriage" where it will be very hard to get a divorce.

However the day after that is not normal. As the girls assemble for practice, you announce "Ladies, we have our first gig. Jack at the Bottomless Pit wants us for a night next week."

The result is screaming cheers. Totally out of proportion from any rational basis. You are being offered what could be minimum wage rates, for what could be no more than one night. You can likely do better washing dishes.
But none of you see it that way. You are now a professional band. Considering the number of bands who never manage a paying gig, that makes you quite a success. You are still a long way from paying the bills, much less actually making a profit, but it's a start. For just this little bit, you can feel wonderful.

"OK, enough. Settle down. We've got a lot of work to be ready. And there is a lot at stake. Jake is mostly doing this as a favor since he got a girlfriend out of this. He's not going to keep us on if we stink. And if he and Pam break up, we had better be really good.
"Now one thing we want to do is pack the audience. You all need to go out and get your friends to drag their boys to the place. We get a friendly audience and the place does good business, we get to come back." It can be argued that you are taking advantage of your friends, but each of you have been to the first night of at least one band because you had a friend, or a friend of a friend, on the band. [You try to forget how many of them had never had a 2nd night.] It's your turn to call in some favors.

"Now we will need wider coverage. I'll be able to take care of the net. Vore is not a widespread interest, and those who like it are pretty scattered, but I know their sites and I should be able to lure some to our show. But what other ideas do we have?"

Several are suggested, most of which sound worth trying. Of course, even those that don't are worth trying just for keeping the lass involved. However, as the suggestion starts to die down, Inbal asks "Who do we have for Mary?"

As is often the case, it is Rachel who answers "That's right. We need somebody for Algie to eat during the Mary song. I suppose we will try for a volunteer, but we can't depend on that. Fay?" she asks the Band's first [and so far only] groupie.

"I'd be better cheering in the audience...I do like watching a lot more than doing." Fay tries to decline. But under pressure, she does agree to be the last ditch backup. "But only if you make an honest effort to find somebody. You have to convince me you really tried."

Jessica is the first to answer "Well, I know a couple of girls who might not refuse outright. I can at least ask..." The others slowly come up with prospects, tho none they express much hope about. "Looks like tomorrow may be busy." Jessica concludes
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: a gig is offered

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
Now how to find a "Mary"? And quickly too? Where to look? The girls have their ideas, but after thinking, you get a couple of your own.
The first is the net. You may not have been the one most obsessed with vore, but you looked into the sites that cover it. Now you can post both about your gig and about your need for a Mary to be eaten during your act. There is no immediate response, but that is hardly a surprise. People may check the sites only every day or two.
So while you wait to see if there is an answer, you go to check on a prospect, Rebecca, your lawyer. She has been in your belly often enough that she might find the idea of performing reasonable.

You arrive and see Alice the secretary is talking with some lass, who notices your arrival and turns, and proves to be Doris, the prisoner you ate in jail. "Well, I've been looking for you. I owe you a favor for getting me out of jail and helping me beat that rap, and I think I know a great way to repay that." Her stance leaves you with no doubt about what she has in mind.

A check with a disapproving Alice reveals Rebecca will be busy for a little while and you and Doris head to the little boy's room, tho right now, you are definitely a big boy. A moment later you are seated on the throne, and Doris is quickly atop you in the cowgirl position. Then she mounts you and sets to most pleasant work.
For a pro, she seems to be enjoying her work quite a bit. Possibly an act, but when you do come to glorious completion, she begs you to hold steady until she can come too, which happens rapidly as she happily collapses against you.
As she recovers, you explain what you are here for and she says she is perfectly willing, except that is working hours for her. Even with bargain rates, it would cost nearly as much as you will get for the night to rent her for the short song. [Maybe if you can take a break to spit her out ..., but even so she is too costly.] So after mutual thanks, you head back to Rebecca's office, where a suspicious Alice escorts you in.

"I am not going to let you take advantage of my little girl." she glares at you.

Rebecca's response has a lot of little girl in it. "Please, I can't have you here during a legal conference with a client."

"Actually I need some non-legal assistance and either of you may be able to help." You explain your need for a girl to play Mary.

"No way!" Alice objects. "You are not involving my baby in anything so undignified."

"Please, it would be fun..."

"Girl, you should listen to your poor mother more." Alice answers, "But if I can't stop you from trying for this, I can try to stop you from doing this in public, by getting the job myself."

"Ah ghee..."

"Excellent. We can have a tryout tomorrow night." you announce, "Now I do have a legal point to discuss, so I guess you have to leave Alice."

Alice does, still sure you are going to take advantage of her innocent "daughter", and you turn to legal points related to the band and your own case, all of which seem to be going fine.
When that is done, you ask "Well, how is it being Alice's daughter?"

"Terrible. I do get a devoted secretary, but she is so protective and controlling. She wouldn't let me out of her womb if she had a choice. And I can't fire her, or even order her around. You just don't do that to your mother."

"Well, she may calm down. After all you are her 'first-born' and she's new to being a mother. But if she doesn't, I can make you her mother. That might make things a little more equal at least."

"And it might really screw things up. For now, I'll hope she mellows out. OK, see you tomorrow night."
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: finding Mary

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
Returning to your digs, you find your net appeal has had quite a few responses. Sadly they are not all from hot chicks who want into your belly and bed. In fact you have quite a few insults from various nuts. [Given that all vore lovers are deemed nuts, it sounds more than a little odd to say just some of them are nuts, but you guess that is the way with any grouping. Some go “too far”, or have silly reservations, or have strange variations… However “sane” your gang, it’s made up of people who considers others nuts.] Others are skeptical of your story, and some are just assuming it is fiction. A few do say they might show… You give them all details of when and where. Given they can be in the next state, or continent, the odds are not good many will be close enough to attend, but…

But right now, you are hoping to find “Mary”, and you are quite pleased to find two women [At least you hope they are female. You never know on the net, and you have had suspicions about the one you are familiar with. Well, you assume they would not be crazy enough to show up if they were not female, and they won’t pass the physical even if they do…] offering to be Mary. You quickly send them a message about when and where you will be holding the try-outs. [You add a warning that they should bring along any serious boyfriends since they will really be in the mood for love afterwards. Normally you wouldn’t bother, but you only have a few days to find a Mary, and you doubt you will have time to find a replacement if your choice suddenly decides that sex afterwards is not acceptable. Better she not apply if she is not going to stick.]

Again you face an evening meeting with the idea you are going to be the big success. Of course, last time, you got upstaged pretty bad, but surely that is not going to happen again… You have your doubts as you see the smiles on the girls as they enter the room. But they can’t have done that well, could they? “You did well?”

Rachel jumps in with “Three, they are…”

“We can get the details later. Linda?”

Linda has 2 prospects, Jessica 1, and Rae 3. Inbal, as happens with her, had an idea that could have produced a dozen, but instead got none. [Inbal can be very smart, and very stupid, at the same time.] Tammy reports she and Laura got two. Laura insists that Tammy got them both, but Tammy insists the credit should be shared.

“Very good. With my four, we have 15 to look over. That should give us a pretty good Mary. Now they do understand when and where? And what they will be doing?” The answers are in the affirmative. “Good, now we can practice the Mary skit and be ready for tomorrow.

“We can also get a new mother-daughter combo.” Laura breaks in. To suggestions this be delayed a little, or a lot, Linda retorts “No way. I am not letting you bitches out from under. You got me into this, and so you are going down too.”

This produces a number of excuses, none of which Laura is willing to accept. Inbal tries “Aren’t I too young to be a mother?”

But Laura responds “You are too young to do a lot of things you do. That hasn’t stopped you before.”

There are no volunteers, and it is Inbal who suggests how to get two. “How about cards? Deal them out. First Queen is the mother. First Ace is the daughter.”

“Sounds about as good as we can do.” you agree, and pull out a deck. “Have a seat. Draw a card each. I start dealing with the high card and go around the group.”

The girls draw without protest until you reach Tammy. “Wait, I already have a child, and am one.” Laura protests.

“You and Tammy are going to acquire several more, so you draw too.” Tammy makes no protest, until she draws the Ace of Spades. You cut her grumbling off with “OK, I start dealing with you, unless Laura draws an ace…” She doesn’t, and you starts shuffling.
“OK, here we go… Tammy...gets a King. Laura..another king…Rachel … is our next mother. Now we need an Ace. Linda..deuce. Jessica..three…Rae…4. Inbal …5…. Now you did see me shuffle. So back to Tammy ..Nine…” You go fully around the table again, and then “And appropriately Inbal will be the baby.” There are sighs of relief from the other girls, quickly followed by remembering there will be more of these in the future.

Inbal asks “Can we do it in the morning?”

You agree. “That will likely be a good time. But now lets get down to practicing.”
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: Laura gets her way

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
The first part of practice is fairly routine, tho Rachel and Inbal are a bit off-key as they keep eying each other, wondering just how bad an idea this mother daughter stuff is. But they both acknowledge the justice of Laura's "punishment" and are going to suffer it. That just doesn't mean they have to be thrilled by the idea.

But the regular part of the practice goes well enough. "OK, time to practice the Frog bit." Rachel announces. "The song, we have down, but Algie will need some practice eating Mary. So I suggest he eat each of us to the recording of the song..."
It's an idea that meets with general approval. They were going to be eaten by you at the end of practice anyway, so why not get a little variety and practice in at the same time? "OK, Jessica, you can go first, then Rae, and then..."

The music starts and Jessica walks past you as "Mary". So you reach out to grab her like you would in the act...and find that practice was a good idea. You aren't sure just how, but you end up falling on your face, and Jessica hits her rump, to the considerable amusement of the other girls. "Guess we had better try that again."
The 2nd time is better, in at least you not getting laughed at, but Jessica's "attempt" to escape is entirely too successful. "Maybe the third time is the charm..."
Well, it is to some extent. "Well, at least this time she got into your mouth. But it still looked all too forced. Algie, spit her out and we'll try again." Rachel decrees.

"Nothing doing!" Jessica disagrees. "I've done my share and you can start doing something. Algie, finish swallowing me!" That is not the sort of order you disobey. Jessica is soon enjoying her trip to your belly, enjoying it a little too much actually.

"You know, it might be a good idea for Mary to get off, but not loud enough to wake the neighbors." Rachel decides. This produces several arguments, but eventually it is agreed "OK, send Mary into gentle rapture." Just another task for you, tho one you will enjoy.
Rae now steps up and the music starts again. This time, things go, if not well, at least without major problems, and Rae is soon also installed in your belly. There are criticisms and corrections, and more tries, but each seems to get better, until Tammy, the last one, is popping into your gut. "How was that? It seemed pretty good." The others agree it sounded fine, but of course they have to wait to see how it looks.

"OK, settle down for bed time. We have a big day tomorrow."

In the morning, the girls are released as usual and want a piece of you as usual. Inbal makes no big fuss about her going into your tool instead of it going into her. She isn't eager, but she makes no trouble. Rachel tho would just love to find a substitute. "Inbal would make you a lovely daughter. Are you sure you don't..." The others are sure. Reluctantly, Rachel spreads for your very oversized member.
Your first entry seems to be quite painful for her [possibly she was just too tense], but she quickly relaxes and starts to enjoy the process. Even the sight of Inbal being pumped into her womb does not bother her, and when she starts to birth Inbal, it is pretty easy.
Starts, that is. By the time Inbal is fully out, Rachel has had a rough time, and is quite frazzled. Still not as bad as Tammy, but this has been work. But like the others, she is quick to demand her new child and to nurse it.
3 down, 46 left to go.
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: practice and testing

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
The next day looks to be a full one, in more than one way. You have, what? fifteen women to gobble down. Of course, you are going to spit a lot of them right back up, but even so, by the end of the evening, there is going to be a huge amount of girl flesh in your belly. Should be a great evening.

The girls in the band are first to arrive and set up. They are not done before the 1st applicant, and some sort of boyfriend, shows up. Rachel has them wait until several other applicants arrive and she can give her instructions to all at once.
"OK, this is rather a weird thing, but it's fairly simple. You are to act the part of Mary, who will be eaten by the giant frog, Algie over there. As the music starts, you will start walking past him and he will grab you. You are to resist, in a futile manner. It can be fairly easy to escape actually, so be careful to be showy, but ineffective. He will swallow you and then spit you back out if you have somewhere else you need to be tonight.
"Now Lillian, you can go first. So just take your clothes off and wait for the music. Robert, when she gets spit out, just grab her and take her to the bedroom behind that door." Robert looks surprisingly unsure of the situation. You would think that since he is getting a free piece, he would be thrilled, not hesitant. Oh well, the music is starting and "Mary" is starting to walk past you. Time for a frog attack.
"Look surprised." you whisper and launch your fake frog tongue. Lillian does a decent job of that as she is pulled back to your waiting mouth, her delicious hips sliding in nicely. As instructed, she flails her limbs uselessly as you proceed to swallow, and to use your tongue on her most sensitive spot. Amazingly quickly she climaxes and delights your taste buds. However, you have to get her down before the song is over, and so can't linger. A bit of a shame. She does have delightful mounds. But soon enough she is just a bulge in your belly, and you are able to make a large [faked, amazing how much has to be. The fake can be done to order, while the real fits its own schedule, which can be very inconvenient.] belch on cue.

With the music done, you spit Lillian out and Robert is right there, and doing nothing. You rather expect Lillian to jump you, but instead, she wraps herself around a rather reluctant Robert.

"Ah, is this really right? You are sorta drunk and I shouldn't take advantage of you..."

"Robert, you are sweet, but somebody is going to take advantage of me, and they had better do it right now. You are the one I selected and you have been trying to get in my pants for ages. So I really want you to take advantage of me."

"But will you feel the same in the morning?"

"I know I will really hate you if you don't get into that bedroom right now. Move it!" Wisely, Robert doesn't resist as Lillian pulls him to the bedroom door.

As the door shuts behind them, Rachel announces "That went reasonably well, but it is time to continue. Now, let me see... Who is next?"
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: the first tryout

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
"I...don't think I'm right for this after all." one of the girls announces to your disappointment.

You are not alone. Her boyfriend tries to pressure her "Now Susan, you can't quit now. You can do it."

Susan is not convinced. "I suppose you would still say that if I said I was going to ball him instead of you?... I thought not." She heads for the door, along with another lass, and her disappointed lad.

The next woman, Natalie, takes the test with no hesitation, but with no talent either. She doesn't taste all that great either. [Not that any of the girls taste less than excellent, but she is the low end of excellent.] She does agree to stay in your belly for the night, which is fun for you and will save a little time on the tests.

Rebecca is up next and does a delicious job. She is followed by Alice, who does great. "Well, how did I do?" she asks. You have to confess she did much better than Rebecca. "Good. I am not going to let my daughter take such an undignified job, even if it means I do it myself."
As Rebecca mutters a disappointed "Mothers..." you are worried a little about Alice. Your eating women in public like this is already pushing a lot of buttons. Add in that you are eating a black woman and you may be crossing a line between daring and in bad taste [not her taste, that's great, but the audience may not approve.] But you can't really say no. She tested fine, and you are Not going to reject her on the grounds of race. This could get messy. Still, there are plenty to test still.

The next candidate is Faith, who tests reasonably, but when you spit her out, she is grabbed by another tasty looking lass "OK Ashanti, let's have some fun."

As the two head to the bedroom, Rachel comments "I didn't really know they were that way..."

"Well, I knew Ashanti was," Rae answers "and I'm not surprised to find Faith is flexible."

Now comes your two vore fans. Lorendana, whose online name is Lean Meat, a reasonably accurate self description [At least you are not going to say you see any excess fat], confesses "All those stories I wrote. All different, but none match how I'm feeling. I don't know... Well, I suppose it's a little late to back out now..." It isn't, but of course, you don't tell her that. Instead, you enjoy her immensely. She does enjoy it anyway.
Michelle, who has posted a couple of times under the name MeatGirl, is eager by contrast, rather too eager. Mary should be resisting being gobbled down, not cheering the frog on. Well, the two of you really enjoyed it anyway.

Now comes a couple of girls whose boyfriends are not at all bothered by the idea they are possibly taking advantage of a drunk. Two others just take up residence in your belly. You are seriously worried about how to handle Alice when Kitt, a rather serious redhead with a nice figure, takes her turn, and just nails it. She also tastes fantastic, even by the high standards of women. She shows just the right amount of objection, neither enough to get the audience out of their chairs and trying to rescue her, nor so little she looks like she wants it. At the same time, she manages to fall into your mouth just like she is being pulled in.
Of course you can't see everything from your position with her in your mouth and blocking much of your view. But as you swallow her toes and can look at the band again, you see a bunch of raised thumbs. You also see the last candidate, Carla?, with a rather stunned look on her face.
She might as well not bother, but she gives it a go, to your pleasure. And gives a good performance. Before Kitt, she would have been in the running. But now ...

"Thank you all for trying out. Kitt, we want to congratulate you, and hope you do as well at our gig. The rest of you, I hope to see you in the audience. And we may have some more songs for you to try out for in the future. I thank you all from the bottom of my... well, I guess it would be belly in my case."
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: Kitt joins the band

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
Practice ends in its normal pleasant way, with the girls deliciously sliding into your belly. And in the morning, they get out, full of lust for your body.

As the new band member, Kitt is a bit surprised, tho happily for you at least not really displeased, at finding her sexual needs have gotten so far out of control. "I'm going to have sex with you every day?" Granted, she doesn't sound thrilled, but that isn't horror either.

It's a little hard to answer since Linda is bouncing up and down on your staff at the moment, which is definitely distracting. "Well, you can hold it in long enough to find some other stud if you want, but you will be wanting some every time you end up in my stomach. So you might as well get off with me."

"Well, I can't say I know any boy I am that hot for...But..." As Kitt considers, Tammy, today's nominee for daughter moves forward and starts sliding into your tool. "What is she doing?" a worried Kitt asks. You explain about the mother-daughter thing as you shoot Tammy into Linda. "Yuk!" is Kitt's quite negative response. "Include me out for that." But she is much happier to find your soldier is free at the moment, and at attention. She jumps on you and starts taking her turn.
Kitt is a believer in the beggar's banquet, and moves slowly and with a number of pauses, enough to get Rae grumbling about the delay. But she eventually gently shutters, only to annoy Rae some more by insisting she needs to get you off too. However, you like the answer and so Rae can only wait for a few moments until you and Kitt climax together. Then she can climb aboard and make both of you happy.
A distinctly pleasant morning.

A week of practice works very well. The act seems to be coming together. And everybody except Kitt [who remains quite unwilling] and you is a mother, a daughter, or both, in some cases more than once. You aren't sure if everybody is related to everybody as mother, daughter, grandmother... yet, but they will be soon. Overall, it is working well. The mothers think the daughters are disobedient, and when they are the daughters, they think their mothers are too controlling, but even when the shouting gets loud, which is not rare, they share a bond and end up working together.

Now comes your gig. Very small time, money, and future, but still your start. You are probably more nervous than if everything was ten times as big. The women are just as worried, with the mothers assuring their daughters they would do fine, and the daughters snapping at them from their worry. You file into the Bottomless Pit in a bad state of nerves.
The first look around is assuring. Maybe the place isn't jammed, but this is supposed to be the slow night and the fact the place has a decent crowd is good new, as is that you and/or some of the girls, recognize some of the crowd. A good-sized, and friendly, crowd. Looks likely you will be back here next week at least. Of course Jake likely knows you have packed the audience, but as long as the place is packed, he is not going to care. And the way Pam is reacting to his hand on her hip, things are fine on that front too.
Soon you are set up and ready to go. You chose the opening piece as one that will help everybody settle down, and it goes well and seems to work. Now it is time for Mary and the Frog.
There are gasps and disapproval, at least from the female half of the audience, when Kitt gets onstage in the nude. They stay negative at first as the song starts, but when you grab Kitt and start swallowing, their mood turns sharply positive. They almost cheer her consumption. Women, who can understand them? The song was supposed to be sympathetic to Mary, and they are cheering the frog? Well, you have heard that 3 out of 4 women haters are women, and as long as they are cheering you, why should you care?
But it is the third piece that is most "crucial". Of itself, it is nothing much, but now is when people will start to request songs and pieces, and of course include money with their requests. Now is when you start to find out if you are getting minimum wage or actual money...
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: starting the gig

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
The song requests come in, the first with a tip that is adequate, in a somewhat negative meaning of the word. But the second tip borders on the generous. Then the third is a bit of a facer.

The lady, a decently endowed Redhead, asks "Can we have Mary again?"

"Well, not unless we have a volunteer to play Mary." you explain. "And we do have people tipping us to play other songs." A not so subtle hint that she should tip too.

"Oh, well..., does it hurt much to be eaten?"

"Not at all." You assure her. "Just lean close and ask Mary."

When she does, Kitt says "Actually, my name is Kitt, and I'm fine."

The lady almost jumps back, but manages to respond "I'm Alison. This is actually safe?"

"I've done it about a dozen times so far. No problems."

"Well, let me check with the others..." and she retreats to a table with three other ladies. After another song, she is back, with a nicely bulging envelope, "OK. I'll be Mary. We drew straws to see who would."

"You lost?"

"No, I won."

You decide it is best to just direct her to where she can strip with a little privacy, and then get ready to do Mary again.
It seems that Alison is quite popular with the crowd. Of course the male half of the popularity is not any surprise. A look reveals that her clothing had done nothing good for her figure. Nude, she is much more pleasing to the male eye. Just why the women like her is not so clear, but no real concern of yours.
As Mary, Alison is good, both as part of the act and as a meal. She is not a match for Kitt in either respect, but should Kitt vanish some time, Alison would be a passable replacement. Of course what she thinks of your tongue playing with her most sensitive spot. She definitely enjoyed it, but girls can be fussy about that. For some reason rapture with the wrong boy is not as good as a crummy time with the right one.
To your disappointment, there are no more volunteers to be Mary. Perhaps just as well. An act ultimately becomes boring, and you don't want to wear out your welcome. But the reception remains positive. You finish to decent cheers.

In the dressing room [or more correctly, the storage room you get to use] afterwards, you cough up Alison, who proves highly receptive to sex with you, and to very good sex. You climax together, and massively.
Afterwards, you offer "You took part in the act, and deserve your money back, your share of it anyway..." Your qualification comes after a glance at the ladies, whose disapproval is definite. That is their money you are offering, and you were the one who had the fun with her.

Fortunately, while she hesitates, Alison declines the cash. "No, I think I need to preserve my amateur standing."

Once she is gone, you ask Rachel, who has been doing the accounting "Well I know we didn't crash and burn, but what is the final result? Did we get more than minimum wage?"
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: finishing the gig successfully

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
"Pretty good, at least for a first time band." Rachel answers. "We got the bills paid, and can have steak tonight. Of course, we may be picking thru trash cans by the end of a week, but we'll make it to next week at least."

"And we will be back here next week." Linda announces. "Jake wants us back. Of course, that is only week to week, but right now that looks to be for as long as we want."

"Great!" you enthuse. "And once we get a couple of more steady gigs, we will start raking it in. Let's blow tonight's profits on a celebration."

"A celebration does sound great, but you are paying for it." Laura answers.

"But..."

"Haven't we been supplying you with your favorite food for weeks now?" Inbal argues, "so isn't it just fair for you to pay for our food tonight?"

"OK, OK," you sigh, "It's the Ritz on me then..."

As the girls cheer, you suddenly realize that Inbal is right. You haven't eaten much of anything but the ladies in a long time. And a lot of that was steak sauce the girls lathered on one night. But you don't feel a bit hungry, at least for any change in your diet. Strange... but so is everything else. And you hardly can say you object. If nothing else, it means you will have to pay for one less dinner at the celebration.

Now begins a long..., well maybe not downer. Things don't get much worse. They just don't improve. You continue to return to the Bottomless Pit and continue to do well enough there. But the new gigs just don't appear. Well, you do get one or two, but these are one shots that lead to nothing.
Essentially, you are paying the bills, but not much more. What you have is pretty much a hobby that you are spending way too much time on. Of course most people lose money on hobbies and you are actually earning, but you can't live on your earnings.

"We can't keep this up." Jessica puts it, "We need more gigs than one night a week. If we can't get them, we have to give it up."

"Well, we can go on the road." Rae suggests. "Our problem is that we cater to a pretty specialized taste, and there just aren't enough people who share it in a city this size. If we can spend a week in each of a dozen cities, we can cash in pretty well. Each city may not have enough to support us, but they know they won't see us again for six month or a year, and will come out in force. Then on to the next city, and the same thing."

"Is this something we can handle?" Inbal asks. "Or will we need an agent?"

"Good point." Laura acknowledges, "It will need a lot of contacts we don't have. We will have to go pro, at least if they are not too expensive. I guess we should all check and see what we can find."
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: a decent total

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
Jessica is the first to announce the problem the next day. "My bra just doesn't fit. It's just so tight..."

Laura chimes in with "Now that you mention it, mine have been feeling small too.

"Now that's strange." Rae adds. "Mine have been pinching of late..."

The rest of the ladies add in their own stories. Each has been noticing problems with bras becoming too small. And then come out some cases of tight blouses.

"What is going on here?" Rachel asks. "Why does everybody seem to have this sudden growth?"

"Isn't increased breast size a sign of pregnancy?" Inbal asks.

"Pregnancy?" Kitt asks. "But that's impossible, isn't it?"

"This whole situation is impossible." Tammy responds. "It's too early for this change in size ... I think... Could Algie be molding us into sexier figures? It sounds strange, but..."

"Algie hasn't been using any protection..." Linda points out. "But surely some of us are on the pill..."

There is a moment of silence as the ladies look at each other. Finally Rachel is the first to confess. "It really makes no sense, but I haven't bothered with it in weeks..." One by one, the others admit they too have not started or have stopped any efforts to avoid pregnancy.

"This is weird." Rae sums up. "We start having regular sex, and then we stop trying to avoid pregnancy? What is going on? What should we do?"

"Make a trip to the drug store for some pregnancy tests for starters." Rachael decides. "After that, we had better invest in protection, or in diapers."

"And we need to buy some new bras," Tammy puts in, "...and bill Algie here. One way or another, he is responsible."

You start to protest, but eight sets of eyes tell you this is not going to be an argument you are going to win. Getting out alive may be an achievement.
Of course, that seems to be a common theme around here. You are outnumbered heavily and lose a lot of arguments. Just why did you want a harem of women like this?
A glance at the partly clad forms in front of you answers that question. Maybe being henpecked is not so bad...
1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.title: next morning

1422122212211122111222122212112211111111.content:
The fact you may be a father within a year adds urgency to the need to get an agent, and a good deal more money. You may not be broke, but you can barely support yourself, much less a half-dozen brats. You have got to get a whole lot more money. [Well, you could stop screwing the girls instead, but...]

So off to to find an agent who can get you the bookings you need. This oriental guy named Thuy seems to fit the bill and you head over to see if he can do you any good.

Well, you get a bit of education anyway. A well endowed oriental lass greets you "Welcome, I'm Thuy."

You start, and apologize "Sorry, I was assuming 'Thuy was male."

Her voice is a bit frosty, but does have acknowledgment that "the customer is always right, even when an idiot." So..."It's Vietnamese, and feminine. I trust that is satisfactory..."

"We can hope." you respond. "I need an agent for my band. We are wanting to go on tour."

"Well, I have good contacts in a lot of places, but only in the porn industry." Thuy warns. "Do you have the right sort of act for that?"

"Well, the act does involve me eating several women."

"Oral sex? I think I can book that. Now..."

"No, I eat women."
